column5: You can relax and enjoy a big-city lifestyle in an exclusive unique community. Beautifully appointed lofts overlooking Downtown Dallas. Just a quick walk to Uptown, outdoor fun at Klyde Warren Park, exploring your artistic side in the Dallas Arts District, or shopping fresh produce at the Farmers Market. Five-star dining, shopping, live music and entertainment all just minutes away. You're right next to the terrace and pool! CVS, restaurants, bars, bank and dry cleaners all inside the building!
column8: Clean Downtown High-rise Condo Great Location!!!
